description:
Professor Yamanobe is a teacher at Hanadera. His passion is dinosaurs, and he loves going to the zoo to watch elephants (as he imagines dinosaurs would walk like elephants do). He is a widower with one daughter. His wife died about a year before the events of Itoshiki Toshitsuki. http://anidb.net/ch1202 [Torii Eriko] proposes to him, which he declines. However she refuses to give up and promises him that she will make him fall in love with her.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Yamanobe
